cosmos.question: I'm big and bright and shine at night, but I'm not the Moon. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I twinkle in the dark.
🔥 I'm a giant ball of fire, far away.
🔭 We see many of me in the night sky.

cosmos.question: I am big and round, and you live on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 Plants and animals live here too!
💧 I have lots of water.
🌎 You can see me from space.

cosmos.question: I go around the Earth, and I shine at night. What am I?

hints.text: 🧀 Sometimes I look like cheese.
🐺 Werewolves like me.
🌑 I have phases, like full and crescent.

cosmos.question: I am hot and bright, and I give the Earth light. What am I?

hints.text: 🌞 You need sunglasses to look at me.
🌻 Flowers grow towards me.
🔥 I am a star, but much closer than the others.

cosmos.question: I am red and rocky and far away from Earth, a planet in our solar system. What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 People want to visit me.
🍫 I am named after the Roman god of war.
🏜️ I am known as the Red Planet.

cosmos.question: I'm a giant ball of gas, the biggest planet of them all, with a big red spot. What am I?

hints.text: 🪐 I have many moons.
💨 I'm made of mostly gas.
🔴 My Great Red Spot is a giant storm!

cosmos.question: I have beautiful rings around me, made of ice and rock. What am I?

hints.text: 💍 My rings are very shiny.
🪐 I am a gas giant.
🔭 You can see my rings with a telescope.

cosmos.question: I am a group of stars that make a picture in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🐻 Some of them look like animals.
✨ You can see them at night.
🌌 The Big Dipper is a famous one.

cosmos.question: I am a ball of ice and dust that flies through space and sometimes has a tail. What am I?

hints.text: ☄️ I can be seen from Earth.
🧊 I am made of frozen gas and dust.
💫 I am also known as 'dirty snowball'.

cosmos.question: I'm a big, big group of stars, gas and dust held together. Our sun is part of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌌 I am vast and hold billions of stars.
✨ I come in different shapes, like spirals and ellipticals.
🥛 The Milky Way is one of me.

food.question: I am yellow and you peel me before you eat me. Monkeys love me! What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I grow on trees.
💛 My color is similar to the sun.
🐒 I am a favorite food for monkeys!

food.question: I am round and red. You can bite into me or make juice from me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I grow on a tree, and sometimes I fall on people's heads!
🔴 My color is similar to a firetruck.
👨‍🌾 Farmers grow me in orchards.

food.question: I am long and orange. Bunnies love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I grow underground.
🟠 My color is similar to a pumpkin.
🐇 A bunny’s favorite snack!

food.question: I am white and cold. You can eat me with a spoon and I'm very sweet. What am I?

hints.text: 🍦 I melt in the sun.
⚪ My color is like snow.
🥄 You usually eat me from a cone or cup.

food.question: I am made of milk, and I can be sliced. You can put me on a sandwich or eat me with crackers. What am I?

hints.text: 🐄 I come from cows.
🧀 I come in many different flavors.
🥪 I am often put on sandwiches.

food.question: I am a fruit, but people often call me a vegetable. I am red and juicy. What am I?

hints.text: 🥗 I am often used in salads.
🔴 My color is like red roses.
🥪 I am often sliced and put on sandwiches.

food.question: I am a small green vegetable that looks like a tiny tree. What am I?

hints.text: 🥦 I am related to cauliflower.
🟢 My color is like grass.
🌳 I look like tiny trees!

food.question: I am made from flour, water, and yeast and baked in the oven. People use me to make sandwiches. What am I?

hints.text: 🍞 I can be toasted.
🌾 I am made from grain.
🥪 Sandwiches use two slices of me.

food.question: I am a grain that grows in a field. Chickens like to eat me. You can pop me into something tasty to eat at the movies. What am I?

hints.text: 🐔 Chickens love to peck at me.
🍿 When heated, I turn into a fluffy white snack.
🎬 I am sold at movie theaters.

food.question: I am made from grapes, but I am not something you drink every day. You can't buy me at every store, and mommies and daddies are allowed to have me but not kids. What am I?

hints.text: 🍇 I start as a grape.
🍾 Grown-ups sometimes drink me at special occasions.
🚫 Kids are not allowed to drink me.
